medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports a gradual increase in LUQ pain over the past 24 hours. Pain is described as constant and cramping in nature, worsened with deep inspiration. Two weeks after a PTC exchange procedure, the pain returned.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic conditions: Diabetes Mellitus Type 2, Hypertension. History of Stage IV cholangiocarcinoma with recent biliary drainage catheter management.
